Job Posting:174044 - Position: W26 Full Stack Web Developer Intern / Co-Op 174044B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/10/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 10/03/2025 01:21 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Retailogists Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description About the Role 2026 - Winter W26 Full Stack Web Developer Intern / Co-Op 174044B Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List 20-25 CAD/hr We're looking for a Full Stack Web Developer Intern with a mix of technical skills, creativity, and communication ability. You'll work closely with our engineering and consulting teams on live e-commerce projects, with the opportunity to grow into a full-time role after graduation. Responsibilities • Contribute to building and maintaining full stack web applications and e-commerce sites. • Collaborate with designers, PMs, and clients to deliver polished, user-friendly experiences. • Work across the stack, from front-end design and implementation to back-end integrations. • Participate in code reviews, Git workflows, and agile project processes. Stay flexible and adaptable, working with multiple technologies and frameworks as needed. • Job Requirements We are only looking for senior year students who will be graduating in 2026: • Excellent written and verbal communication skills. • Previous professional experience (internship or freelance) building full stack websites. • Bonus: experience with e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Wix, Magento. • Proficiency with Git for version control. • Strong eye for design and user experience. • Willingness to work across the stack and learn multiple technologies/frameworks. Currently in final year of study or graduating soon, with potential to continue full time. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://www.retailogists.com/job-openings-1/full-stack-intern Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
